document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Best </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">Moment </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">last </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">'Twould </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">supersede </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">few </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Risk </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">procure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">Sort </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">given </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Except </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">stimulants </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Cases </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">Despair </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">Stupor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9084d4">Reserve </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">These </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Heavenly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">moments </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">Grant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Divine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Certain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Comes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Withdraws </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">leaves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">dazzled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">Soul </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">unfurnished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Rooms </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Did our best moment last
